definition: A period of time typically consisting of two consecutive days, often occurring at the end of the week, during which individuals commonly take a break from work or school to relax, engage in leisure activities, or spend time with family and friends.

examples.german: Am Wochenende gehe ich gerne spazieren.
examples.english: I like to go for a walk on the weekend.

examples.german: Wir treffen uns am Wochenende zum Kaffeetrinken.
examples.english: We meet up for coffee on the weekend.

examples.german: Am Wochenende habe ich endlich Zeit zum Lesen.
examples.english: I finally have time to read on the weekend.

examples.german: Am Wochenende fahre ich oft zu meinen Eltern.
examples.english: I often visit my parents on the weekend.

examples.german: Am Wochenende gehe ich gerne ins Kino.
examples.english: I like to go to the cinema on the weekend.
